function_description: Close the 'Edit Password' modal dialog without making any changes.
initial_state: User is logged into the web application and navigates to the 'Authentication' settings page. The 'Edit Password' modal dialog is open.
steps: Locate the 'close' button in the modal header.
Click the 'close' button to exit the 'Edit Password' modal dialog.
expected_state: The 'Edit Password' modal dialog is closed, returning the user to the previous page or state without any password changes occurring.
